name: 🚀 Deploy .NET 8 API to Azure App Service

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: 📦 Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: 🧰 Setup .NET 8
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: '8.0.x'

      - name: 🔧 Restore dependencies
        run: dotnet restore ./InduccionAPI.sln

      - name: 🏗️ Build
        run: dotnet build ./InduccionAPI.sln --configuration Release --no-restore

      - name: 🚀 Publish
        run: dotnet publish ./InduccionAPI/InduccionAPI.csproj -c Release -o ./publish --no-build

      - name: 🌐 Deploy to Azure
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v3
        with:
          app-name: planes-induccion-api       # 👈 nombre exacto de tu App Service
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZURE_WEBAPP_PUBLISH_PROFILE }}
          package: ./publish
